name: Clevast
0:
”Alexa, Turn on dehumidifier”
”Alexa, Set dehumidifier to continuous”
”Alexa, Set dehumidifier to 70% humidity”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Clevast skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your dehumidifier by voice.To get started, select the'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App 
to link your Clevast account and discover your devices.
When using the skill, you need established names for your devices.There are two ways to define these names:
Use the names you previously set up. They are shown in the Clevast app and can be changed
Create an Alexa group, like Kitchen or Living Room,and add the device to the group. 
Once you know the name or group name for your devices,you can say the following:
"Alexa, Turn on dehumidifier"
"Alexa, Set dehumidifier to comfortable"
"Alexa, Set dehumidifier to dehumidify"
"Alexa, Set dehumidifier to continuous"
"Alexa, Set dehumidifier 70% humidity"
"Alexa, Turn off dehumidifier"
